positive: Sorry for all of this text, but I would love some advice, if it is based on personal experience that would be a lot better, but all suggestions are welcome, thanks!
So yes, very good slim light laptop overall, 15.3" screen size is perfect too, though I hope these spinning wheel, fan noise, trackpad issues are all software related and get a quick fix from Lenovo.
Display: The anti-glare coating is great for this and really helps when it is sunny outside and the sun is very bright.
negative: But generally speaking, if you can get a MacBook just get the MacBook, unless you're doing something Apple isn't great at like gaming.
* Edit #6: Update as of 16 Oct 2022: The hinge is shit quality, it has broken twice till now in the exact same manner with completely normal use.
All IPS panels have IPS glow, but this one has the worst case of glow I've ever seen.

positive: So yes, very good slim light laptop overall, 15.3" screen size is perfect too, though I hope these spinning wheel, fan noise, trackpad issues are all software related and get a quick fix from Lenovo.
Display: The anti-glare coating is great for this and really helps when it is sunny outside and the sun is very bright.
Speakers are really good too but make sure Dolby Atmos is enabled for the best sound.
negative: This is gonna be my laptop for college, I bought a Zephyrus G15 (yes you read that right, yes I'm downgrading), and I think the battery is so bad it's actually defective.
But, seeing its battery capacity as 45Wh, no wonder it has low battery backup.
I feel bad now for sharing that shit piece.

positive: Sorry for all of this text, but I would love some advice, if it is based on personal experience that would be a lot better, but all suggestions are welcome, thanks!
So yes, very good slim light laptop overall, 15.3" screen size is perfect too, though I hope these spinning wheel, fan noise, trackpad issues are all software related and get a quick fix from Lenovo.
The screen is great, vibrant and with great blacks, despite being a IPS screen.
